apiVersion: Defines the API version of the deployment. This will commonly be "v1", but this can change depending on if it is a beta or alpha deployment or a custom resource definition.
kind: Defines the kind of the deployment.
metadata: Defines the metadata of the deployment.
spec: This tells Kubernetes to follow the specification based on the kind of the deployment.
type: This defines the type of the secret.
data: This defines the data that will be included in the secret.
